description: A server-side MVC framework written in Ruby. Some subcommands such as generate have their own usage documentation. More information: https://guides.rubyonrails.org/command_line.html.

useCases.description: Generate a scaffold for a model named Post, predefining the attributes title and body:
useCases.syntax: rails generate scaffold Post title:string body:text
